titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation appointing the general fast which according to former order falleth out to be on Wednesday the first of November, being All Saints Day, to be kept on the Wednesday following, being the eighth of that moneth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at the court at Oxford the twenty sixth day of September, in the seventeenth year of His Majesties reign. 1665."
Imperfect: stained, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
